description: Bon Ton Stores: Owns and operates stores which offer apparel, cosmetics, home furnishings, bedding and furniture, fine jewelry and leased maternity departments. Bon Ton is listed atop Alliance Data's Hot 100 Retailers list which can be found at: http://www.stores.org/pdf/HOT100chart.pdfThis data was collected from Bon Ton's webpage at: http://www.bonton.com/This data was geocoded according to address and the latitude and longitude coordinates.
